name: The Colossal Carrot Caper
description:
The Colossal Carrot Caper

A Rhythm Stealth Game. Move to the music, collect carrots, and become The Colossal Carrot Caper. Built for Ludum Dare 41 in 72 hours.

Visit our Ludum Dare page:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/the-colossal-carrot-caper

🎵 Controls

WASD to move (Sync with the beat)

Team
  • Code - Dekobii (@dekobii)
  • Code - EdenOrange (@edenorange)
  • Art - rush (@rush)

Music: Johnny Dodds Trio - Little Bits  Music: Johnny Dodds Trio - Wild Man Blues
